discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory room by navigating to the 'Dormitories' page, selecting an available room for your desired dates, and filling out the booking form with your personal and payment transfer details. After submitting, you'll receive instructions to send your payment proof via Telegram for verification.
faqQ2Title: How do companies book halls or sections?
faqQ2Answer: Companies must first register an account. Once approved, company representatives can log in, browse available halls/sections, select dates, choose services (like catering or LED projectors), and submit a booking request. The request will be reviewed, and if approved, an agreement will be sent for signature.
faqQ3Answer: Currently, we primarily accept payments via direct bank transfer. For dormitory bookings, after submitting your request, you'll receive bank details to make the transfer. For facility bookings by companies, payment instructions are provided after the booking is approved and the agreement is finalized. We are working on integrating Chapa for online payments.
faqQ4Title: What are the check-in and check-out times for dormitories?
faqQ4Answer: Standard check-in time for dormitories is after 2:00 PM on the arrival date, and check-out is before 12:00 PM (noon) on the departure date. Please contact administration for any special requests.
faqQ5Title: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faqQ5Answer: For cancellations or modifications, please contact our administration office as soon as possible. Policies regarding changes or cancellations will be outlined in your booking confirmation or rental agreement. Generally, early notification is appreciated.
faqQ6Title: Are there any discounts for long-term stays or bulk bookings?
faqQ6Answer: We may offer special rates for long-term dormitory stays or large-scale facility bookings. Please contact our sales or administration team directly to discuss your requirements and potential discounts.
faqQ7Title: What amenities are provided with hall/section rentals?
faqQ7Answer: Standard hall and section rentals typically include chairs, tables, and basic lighting. Optional services like catering (lunch, refreshment), LED projectors (for sections), and sound systems can be added to your booking. Please specify your needs when booking or discuss with our team.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: The capacity for this dormitory is not configured correctly. Please contact an administrator.

bookingPermissionDeniedError: You do not have permission to create this booking. Please ensure you are logged in with the correct account type or contact support.
bookingPermissionDeniedErrorDetailed: Permission denied by Firestore rules. Ensure the authenticated user has the correct role and permissions configured in Firebase for creating bookings and notifications.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: It appears you already have a pending or approved dormitory booking for this phone number on the selected start date. You cannot book more than one dormitory room per day with the same phone number.
globalPricingSettingsDescription: Set default prices for services. These prices will be used if no specific price is set for an individual dormitory, hall, or section.
pricingHierarchyInfoDesc: Prices set directly on individual dormitories, halls, or sections will override these global defaults. If a specific item has no price, the global default will be used. Catering and LED projector costs are based on these global settings unless a specific item has a more detailed override mechanism (currently not implemented for catering per-item).
